subject: Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A Fulton County (Ga.) Superior Court judge ruled that Turner Broadcasting System must pay the Texas businessman David McDavid $281 million, as a jury said last year. Judge Tom Campbell denied Turner Broadcasting’s request to overturn a verdict that favored McDavid, who accused the company of cheating him out of buying the Atlanta Hawks, Atlanta Thrashers and the Philips Arena operating rights in 2003. TBS has 30 days to appeal Campbell’s ruling.
